song_name: Lied von der Unzulanglichkeit menschlichen Streben
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Lied von der Unzulanglichkeit menschlichen Streben is more complex than the typical song, having above average scores in Chord Complexity, Melodic Complexity, Chord Progression Novelty and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion:
Lied von der Unzulanglichkeit menschlichen Streben is written in the key of C Major.  

According to the Theorytab database, it is the most common key in all of popular music.
